title: Demystifying the PTE Scoring Algorithm
description: Learn how the PTE AI scoring engine works. Understand enabling skills vs communicative skills and how to optimize your performance.
author: Tech Team
content:
The Automated Scoring System

PTE Academic is scored entirely by a computer automated scoring system. There are no human examiners. This ensures impartiality and consistency.

Communicative Skills

These are the scores reported to institutions:

  • Listening
  • Reading
  • Speaking
  • Writing

Enabling Skills

These skills support your communicative scores but are no longer explicitly shown on newer score reports (though they still matter internally):

  • Fluency: Smoothness of speech.
  • Pronunciation: Intelligibility to native speakers.
  • Grammar: Correct usage of language rules.
  • Vocabulary: Range and appropriateness of words.
  • Spelling: Adherence to standard spelling conventions.
  • Written Discourse: Structure and flow of written text.

How to Use This to Your Advantage

Since an AI judges you, you can 'game' the system slightly by focusing on what the AI prioritizes: clarity, structure, and keyword relevance. Fluency often outweighs complex content in Speaking tasks.
